tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I would like to express my deepest appreciation and gratitude for the remarkable care and exceptional treatment Dr. Tijo George provided to my niece. His expertise, patience, and compassionate approach have significantly impacted her dental health and overall well-being.
During our first visit to Dr. Tijo, we were deeply concerned about my niece's complex dental condition. Her teeth were crowded, and she still had many milk teeth in her upper and lower jaws. We had consulted with several other dentists in the past, but none of them were able to provide us with the same level of confidence and good treatment that Dr. Tijo George did. Thanks to his professional guidance and skillful interventions, my niece's dental condition has improved significantly. We are grateful for his help in transforming our worry into a better smile on my niece's face.
His ability to connect with patients personally is highly appreciated and played a significant role in her overall comfort and confidence. I wholeheartedly Thank Dr. Tijo Geroge and wish him great success in his future endeavors.  With his divine and healing treatment may he continue to bring smiles to countless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
* **** *** ***** *** **** ****** ** * ********* He has done magic on my teeth and now my entire face has got transformed for good. The treatment tenure was only 8 months, very cost effective too.
I have been looking to fix the gaps in my teeth from ages. However, couldn’t find a orthodontist good enough to convince me get treated by them. I shifted to Bangalore and by some source I found Dr. Tijo George. In the first consultation itself he sounded very experienced and expert in his job. My treatment is over now and obviously all gaps are closed and result is very satisfactory. Dr. Tijo is very polite and patient too. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had been to Dr.Tijos clinic  for straightening my teeth.
The treatment was very satisfactory.  The doctor had explained about every aspect in detail about the treatment  patiently . The treatment was mostly painless  and comfortable  .The cost if the treatment was also affordable. The clinic setup had a very patient friendly atmosphere .They give appointments and follow up according to the comfort and ease of the patient. The treatment results were obvious and glad
A fellow feeling and compassionate doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Teeth Straightening,Ceramic Braces Fixing,
review: Doctor is too good. I'm really confident about his judgement of my treatment and the end result. He's friendly and professional at the same time. He explains the treatment procedure, his analysis and the way he'd plan to implement it. He makes sure only the necessary is done, like in my case didn't just randomly extracted 4 teeth but studied my case and saw only 1 tooth needed the extraction. It's been 6 months since I started my treatment and he has been present in all the appointments. I'm really happy!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly a big sorry for this late review.I consulted Dr.Tijo to sort out the problem of improper teeth alignment which I was really worried about and he explained to me all the possibilities , pros and cons of each procedure . I’m working abroad and I underwent corticotomy which is actually a risky procedure but Dr Tijo made me so comfortable and I received the best treatment and the result was soooo good . I was a person who was really scared of dental procedures but Dr Tijo’s reassurance and the way he deals with a patient  and the way he explains everything is excellent. 
I will always suggest to consult Dr Tijo if you are worried about any dental issues. Thank you so much Dr for all the hardwork and wishing you all the very best and all success in your future endeavours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had one teeth backside compared to all other teeth. So doctor put braces on upper teeth as per requirement and completed the treatment within said time. Now all my upper front teeth are aligned and my smile is good than before. So thank you very much Dr George.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This doctor is amazing, very professional, we visited him with a reference. My daughter has been visiting him for teeth braces..he handles the issue in a systematic way..explains the procedure thoroughly...definitely recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thought it took time, it was completely worth it. Dr Tijo was not only patient throughout the numerous times I had broken my brackets but also very practical about it. I truly appreciate the way he took time to actually explain the situation and made sure I understood what the problem was and what could be done. I have perfect teeth now and that's all thanks to the wonderful treatment by my dentist, Dr. Tijo!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend dr Tijo for his experience and his patience. My teeth finally aligned after 2 braces failure in past. When I first consulted dr Tijo, he gave me the confident and assurance about my teeth alignment.Firstly, I started with metal braces and then due to allergic reaction I have to wait for couple of months.He make sure my allergic reactions are settled and then I started  wearing ceramic braces as per his suggestion. During every checkup, he explains my teeth current state and provided me the  advice on  how I should take care of my teeth during this journey. Yes, the process itself is painful and time consuming, but with the right Dr. You can always feel grateful at the end. Now my teeth is properly aligned and I am confident enough to smile. Thank you Dr Tijo for the wonderful treatment and the end result. I strongly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I got my braces done from Dr. George.  He is very patient. He would answer all of my questions and concerns. My lower teeth were especialy stubborn, and his treatment plan for them was very impressive. The treatment was not very uncomfortable to begin with, but if there was any discomfort he would quickly try to find alternatives and resolve my issues. I was sceptical about the process at first, but the results are amazing! You need to check him out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
